CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound aluminum
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding aluminum unravels the self. Identity bleeds away — memories, loyalties, even a sense of purpose — all dissolve into the metalmind. What remains is a shell, empty but waiting. One day, that identity can be reclaimed... or replaced.
